title: Cap Streamers
dimensions: H x W: 54 x 10.5 cm (21 1/4 x 4 1/8 in.) each
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap streamers of Point d'Argentan in a design composed of outlining serpentine band intertwined with floral garlands framing centrally-placed floral sprays. Fond: réseau. Modes: bride bouclée, réseau mouché, venises, enchainettes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Streamers.
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-9-a,b.
